translation.en: Hello, my name is Detective Gil Carrillo,
translation.zh: 大家好 我是吉尔卡里略警探

translation.en: Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department, assigned to Homicide Bureau.
translation.zh: 在洛杉矶县警局凶杀科就职

translation.en: The Sheriff's Department is conducting an investigation…
translation.zh: 警局目前正在进行一项调查

translation.en: on a series of homicides and sexual assaults occurred in Los Angeles County.
translation.zh: 主要调查洛杉矶县一系列的凶杀案和性侵案

translation.en: The suspect, who has traveled highways in what we believe to be stolen vehicles,
translation.zh: 我们相信嫌疑经常驾驶盗窃车辆在高速公路上行驶

translation.en: is always wearing gloves to make his entries.
translation.zh: 佩戴手套潜入别人家里行窃

translation.en: The suspect has used
translation.zh: 此嫌疑犯使用过

translation.en: [echoing] guns, knives, tire irons, handcuffs and thumbcuffs,
translation.zh: 枪支、刀具、轮胎扳手、手铐、指拷

translation.en: as well as his own foot, to inflict serious…
translation.zh: 还有自己的脚 来施加严重的…

translation.en: Los Angeles City has almost all benefits and no negatives.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶这个城市有各种好处没有一点缺点

translation.en: [woman 1] This was a decade when the queen visited, the Pope visited.
translation.zh: 这是女王、教皇访问的那个年代

translation.en: We had the Olympics.
translation.zh: 我们举办过奥运会

translation.en: We were proud of the city, proud of LA.
translation.zh: 我们为这座城市骄傲 为洛杉矶骄傲

translation.en: For the first time in recorded history, our freeways were relatively clear.
translation.zh: 有史以来第一次我们的高速公路畅通无阻

translation.en: -[woman 1] It was a huge decade. -Crime dropped like a rock.
translation.zh: -这十年变化巨大-犯罪率也急剧下降

translation.en: [reporter] Our top story, record temperatures and fires scorching the Southland.
translation.zh: 今晚的头条新闻是创记录的高温和在南部蔓延的大火…

translation.en: [reporter 2] Downtown the mercury reached 107 degrees this afternoon.
translation.zh: 没错 今天下午市中心的温度达到了摄氏41度

translation.en: [woman 1] You have this amazing city, so many parallel universes.
translation.zh: 这是一座神奇的城市 包罗万象

translation.en: [woman 2] LA was a facade.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶就是门面

translation.en: From one side, it was glamorous celebrities.
translation.zh: 一方面洛杉矶是光鲜的 充斥着各种名人

translation.en: But if you went around to the other side…
translation.zh: 但如果你去看另一面…

translation.en: …LA could be a very dark place.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶也可以非常黑暗

translation.en: [woman 2] You could be anybody.
translation.zh: 你可以在这里成为任何人

translation.en: It also attracted very, very dangerous people.
translation.zh: 但这座城市也会吸引极度危险的人物

translation.en: Nobody knows where this individual may strike next.
translation.zh: 没有人知道这个人下次会在哪里作案 （洛杉矶警局 谢尔曼布洛克）

translation.en: [reporter 3] The same man is suspected in six to eight murders and 25 to 30 attacks.
translation.zh: 同一个人涉嫌参与六至八起谋杀案25到30起袭击案

translation.en: There's sort of a thin line between
translation.zh: 过度担忧和保持危机意识之间

translation.en: being paranoid about it and being aware of it.
translation.zh: 过度担忧和保持危机意识之间 只有一线之隔

translation.en: …the so-called Night Stalker who has terrorized California.
translation.zh: …让加利福尼亚陷入恐慌的黑夜跟踪狂

translation.en: He struck again.
translation.zh: 昨天再次作案

translation.en: People wonder when and where he'll strike next.
translation.zh: 人们不知道这个人会在何时何地再次行凶

translation.en: Everybody is scared.
translation.zh: 我认为所有人都很害怕

translation.en: I am not leaving my door open for my son, I don't care if he sleeps on the street.
translation.zh: 我不再为我的儿子晚上留门我不管他会不会睡大街

translation.en: [woman] I don't understand why somebody can't identify him.
translation.zh: 我不能理解为什么没有人知道这个人是谁

translation.en: He has to live somewhere. Somebody must know.
translation.zh: 这个人肯定要住在哪里肯定有人认识

translation.en: He's a weird-looking character. Somebody has to know him.
translation.zh: 这个人打扮怪异 肯定有人认识

translation.en: [Gil] I don't believe that anybody has a choice.
translation.zh: 我不认为任何人能够选择

translation.en: Your number is there one day. We're all going to die.
translation.zh: 总有一天会轮到你 我们都将死去

translation.en: We just don't know when.
translation.zh: 我们只是不知道会是何时

translation.en: You start dying the day you were born.
translation.zh: 你刚一出生 就开始走向死亡

translation.en: I was born and raised in the Catholic Church.
translation.zh: 我在天主教家庭出生和长大

translation.en: I believe in God. I believe in the Holy Spirit.
translation.zh: 我信奉上帝 我信奉圣灵

translation.en: I believe there's a devil. I believe there's an evil force.
translation.zh: 我相信有恶魔 我相信有邪恶的力量

translation.en: I just say prayers, hopefully to help give me the wisdom and the knowledge
translation.zh: 我只是祈祷希望可以赐予我智慧和学识

translation.en: to bring this case to a solution.
translation.zh: 来解决这个案件

translation.en: All the people on the block that I lived on, were Mexicans.
translation.zh: 我所住的街区 所有人都是墨西哥裔

translation.en: There was a gang where I lived.
translation.zh: 我住的那里有一个帮派

translation.en: We all hung out on the corner of Dulin and Holbrook.
translation.zh: 我们所有人都在杜林和霍尔布鲁克街角闲逛

translation.en: They were more important than school was to me,
translation.zh: 对于我来说 他们比学校更加重要

translation.en: and I didn't realize that until a cop
translation.zh: 我一直都没有意识到有问题直到一个警察

translation.en: told my mom and dad, "Sign for this young man to get off the street,
translation.zh: 告诉我父母：“别让他在街上闲逛了 送他入伍吧

translation.en: or he'll end up dead or in prison."
translation.zh: 否则他不是死掉 就是进监狱”

translation.en: And, so, at age 17, my parents signed for me to go into the Army.
translation.zh: 因此 在我17岁那年父母把我送进了军队

translation.en: I was a crew chief with 189th Assault Helicopter Company in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 我在越南 是空袭连队第189号直升机的机长

translation.en: I saw heavy, heavy combat.
translation.zh: 我目睹了激烈的战斗

translation.en: By the grace of God, I made it out alive, and…
translation.zh: 感谢上帝 我活着回来了

translation.en: as soon as I got out of Armed Forces, I had three goals in life.
translation.zh: 我一离开军队 就定了三个人生目标

translation.en: One was to start dating my former girlfriend,
translation.zh: 第一 去找我前女友复合

translation.en: who had dumped me while I was in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 我在越南的时候 她抛弃了我

translation.en: I wanted to see if I could get her back, then break up with her.
translation.zh: 我想要试试我能否跟她和好然后再甩了她

translation.en: I wanted revenge, I wanted to hurt her like she had hurt me.
translation.zh: 我想要报仇我想要像她伤害我一样 去伤害她

translation.en: But it didn't work out that way. [laughs]
translation.zh: 但是后来事情没有那样发展

translation.en: [Pearl] He got out of the service in June,
translation.zh: 他6月退伍

translation.en: and we were married by December.
translation.zh: 我们在12月结婚

translation.en: [Gil] December 26, 1970.
That was goal number one. Goal number two was to go to college.
translation.zh: 这是我的第一个目标第二个目标是考上大学

translation.en: Nobody in my family had ever gone to college,
translation.zh: 我们家没有人上过大学

translation.en: and I thought college was for rich white people.
translation.zh: 那时我以为上大学的都是有钱的白人

translation.en: So, I enrolled at Rio Hondo College…
translation.zh: 因此 我去了瑞航德学院

translation.en: and started going there.
translation.zh: 每天在那里学习

translation.en: Two out of three goals I accomplished.
translation.zh: 三个目标我已经完成了两个

translation.en: And the third one was I wanted to become a cop.
translation.zh: 第三个目标就是 我想成为一名警察

translation.en: October 1st, 1971…
I became a patrol cop at East LA Sheriff's Station.
translation.zh: 我在东洛杉矶警局 成为了一名巡警

translation.en: When I was 29 years of age, I got an outstanding evaluation.
translation.zh: 在我29岁那年 获得了优秀功勋章

translation.en: Those were hard to come by.
translation.zh: 那是很难得到的

translation.en: When I showed it to my mom and dad, my dad looked up and said…
translation.zh: 当我给父母看的时候我爸爸看着我 然后说

translation.en: "I'm proud of you, son."
translation.zh: “我为你感到骄傲 儿子”

translation.en: And he had never said that to me in my life.
translation.zh: 在那之前 他从来没有跟我这样说过

translation.en: He always wanted to make his dad proud.
translation.zh: 他总是希望让他爸爸感到骄傲

translation.en: Proud of him.
translation.zh: 为他感到骄傲

translation.en: [Gil] After that, I watched guys from homicide work.
translation.zh: 从那之后 我看凶杀科的同事工作

translation.en: They were so meticulous, so good.
translation.zh: 他们都非常细心 很厉害

translation.en: When they pulled up on the scene, everybody got out of their way.
translation.zh: 当他们出警的时候 所有人都让路

translation.en: "Wow, sheriff's homicide's here."
translation.zh: “警局凶杀科来了”

translation.en: I told them, "One of these days, I want to do your job."
translation.zh: 我告诉他们：“总有一天 我也要做你们的工作”

translation.en: March 23rd, 1981…
I get called to go to Homicide Bureau.
translation.zh: 我被调到了凶杀科

translation.en: I only had nine and a half years experience.
translation.zh: 虽然我只有九年半的经验

translation.en: That was my goal, that was my dream, and… I made it.
translation.zh: 但这是我的目标是我的梦想 我做到了

translation.en: The Bulldogs. That was their nickname.
translation.zh: 斗牛犬 这是凶杀科的绰号

translation.en: I covered hundreds of crimes and dozens and dozens of murders…
translation.zh: 我报道了几百起犯罪案件还有很多谋杀案

translation.en: In downtown Los Angeles, Tony Valdez… [echoing] …Channel 11 News.
translation.zh: 我是新闻11频道的托尼瓦尔迪兹在洛杉矶市中心为您报道

translation.en: …and I can tell you there were a lot of murders that ended up being solved
translation.zh: …我可以告诉你们很多谋杀案在20年后被侦破了

translation.en: 20 years later, because the Bulldogs never let go.
translation.zh: 因为斗牛犬从不放过任何一个案件

translation.en: [Frank] We probably ran 350, 400 murders a year
translation.zh: （洛杉矶县警局凶杀科弗兰克萨勒诺警探） 在县警局的凶杀科工作

translation.en: for the sheriff's homicide bureau.
translation.zh: 我们每年处理350到400起谋杀案

translation.en: Los Angeles Police Department was probably running 500 or 600.
translation.zh: 而洛杉矶警察局大概处理500到600起

translation.en: So, in LA County, there's probably close to 1,000 murders a year.
translation.zh: 也就是说 在洛杉矶整个县每年发生将近1000起谋杀案

translation.en: And it takes a big ego, because you got to have confidence in what you're doing.
translation.zh: 这项工作需要拥有很强的自我认同感因为你要对自己做的事情有信心

translation.en: You're investigating the ultimate crime.
translation.zh: 你在调查极恶的犯罪案件

translation.en: There's nothing more serious than one human being taking the life of another.
translation.zh: 没有什么事能比一个人杀死另一个同类更为严重

translation.en: [Gil] Frank Salerno's the Italian Stallion, he's the goombah, he's… he's everything.
translation.zh: 弗兰克萨勒诺是意大利人他是个好同事 他是一切

translation.en: When I got there, he was working on the Hillside Strangler.
translation.zh: 当我刚入职时他正在调查山腰绞杀手案件

translation.en: [reporter] This is where the first Hillside Strangler victim was found.
translation.zh: 这里是山腰绞杀手案件第一个受害者的发现地

translation.en: The death of Laura Collins and 12 other young women
translation.zh: 死者劳拉柯林斯和其他12名年轻女性死者

translation.en: touched off one of the largest manhunts in Southern California history.
translation.zh: 令执法单位展开了加州南部历史上最大规模的搜捕行动

translation.en: [Gil] Everybody looked up to him. He's the man.
translation.zh: 所有人都很尊敬他 他是最强的！

translation.en: [man] If you saw Frank Salerno or heard his name,
translation.zh: 如果你见到弗兰克萨勒诺或是听到他的名字

translation.en: these were not small-time crimes.
translation.zh: 就说明那不是轻微刑事案件

translation.en: They were bringing heavy guns.
translation.zh: 警局派出了最有经验的人

translation.en: Frank Salerno was a straight shooter. He's a disciplined guy.
translation.zh: 弗兰克萨勒诺是个直率、纪律严明的人

translation.en: He was always a poker face.
translation.zh: 他总是面无表情

translation.en: He's very businesslike.
translation.zh: 他很有条不紊

translation.en: [reporter] His co-workers call him a cop's detective.
translation.zh: 他的同事称他为警察的警探

translation.en: [man] Frank overlooks nothing.
translation.zh: 弗兰克不会放过任何细节

translation.en: You'd be surprised how thorough he is on an investigation.
translation.zh: 你会震惊于 他调查时的事无巨细

translation.en: [Frank] Gil Carrillo and Jim Mercer were teamed together as partners.
translation.zh: 吉尔卡里略和吉姆默瑟组成搭档合作办案

translation.en: He sat at a desk that was behind me and to my left.
translation.zh: 他坐在我左后方的一张桌子前

translation.en: And he was the youngest detective in the Bureau at the time.
translation.zh: 他是当时凶杀科最年轻的警探

translation.en: One day, Frank comes over and says,
translation.zh: 一天 弗兰克走到我面前说

translation.en: "Want to go down to Little Joe's?" An Italian restaurant in Chinatown.
translation.zh: “要不要一起去小乔的店”那是一家在中国城里的意大利餐馆

translation.en: And I'm sitting there and I've never eaten Italian food.
translation.zh: 我当时坐在那里我之前从没吃过意大利菜

translation.en: I grew up in a Mexican home. That's what I know, is Mexican food.
translation.zh: 我出生在一个墨西哥家庭我所知道的就只是墨西哥食物

translation.en: I look at this menu and I don't recognize anything.
translation.zh: 我看着菜单 但都看不懂

translation.en: I don't know what it is. I remember ordering chicken Parmesan.
translation.zh: 我不知道那些都是什么我记得当时点了意式帕马森烤鸡

translation.en: And I'm eating this food and I'm laughing.
translation.zh: 我吃着烤鸡 然后笑了

translation.en: Salerno looked at me, said, "What's so funny, kid?" I said,
translation.zh: 萨勒诺看着我说：“什么这么好笑 孩子？”

translation.en: "Here I am, last week, I'm eating a double-wrapped red chili burrito
translation.zh: 我说：“上周 我吃了一个双层红椒玉米饼

translation.en: off the hood of a radio car in east LA.
translation.zh: 坐在东洛杉矶一辆警务车的引擎盖上吃的

translation.en: Tonight, I'm wearing a suit and tie,
translation.zh: 而今晚 我西装革履

translation.en: eating some shit that I don't know what it is, drinking a glass of wine
translation.zh: 吃些不知道是什么的鬼东西喝着红酒

translation.en: with Frank Salerno and the guys from Homicide.
translation.zh: 和弗兰克萨勒诺以及凶杀科其他同事一起

translation.en: It don't get any better than that."
translation.zh: 我并没有觉得比上周好”

translation.en: [woman] I was working at AT&T,
translation.zh: 我当时在美国电话电报公司工作

translation.en: and across the street was a mini-mall.
translation.zh: 街对面有一个小商场

translation.en: And in there was a Salvation Army store.
translation.zh: 里面有一个救世军组织的二手商店

translation.en: And I would just spend my lunch hour in there.
translation.zh: 我经常在那里打发我的午餐时间

translation.en: And once, I was in there,
translation.zh: 有一次我进到商店里里面有一张桌子

translation.en: there was a table that was full of junk,
translation.zh: 有一次我进到商店里里面有一张桌子 上面全是垃圾 还有这顶帽子

translation.en: and there was this hat.
translation.zh: 上面全是垃圾 还有这顶帽子

translation.en: And I picked it up, 'cause the letters on it said "AC/DC."
translation.zh: 我拿起了帽子 因为上面写着“AC/DC”

translation.en: I didn't know what that was, and thought it was kind of weird.
translation.zh: 我不知道是什么意思 就觉得很奇怪

translation.en: And so, I threw it back down.
translation.zh: 所以就把帽子又扔了回去

translation.en: And then on my right, here comes this man,
translation.zh: 然后这个男人就从我右边走了过来

translation.en: and he stood right there and picked up the hat…
translation.zh: 他站在那里 捡起了那顶帽子

translation.en: looked at it…
translation.zh: 看着帽子

translation.en: turned around and looked at me,
translation.zh: 转过来看向我

translation.en: and kind of smiled a little bit,
translation.zh: 还带着一点微笑

translation.en: and he had the devil on his hand.
translation.zh: 把手上有一个恶魔

translation.en: A picture. A round circle with the face of the devil.
translation.zh: 那是一幅画那是一个拥有恶魔之脸的圆圈

translation.en: You know, with the horns?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？还长着犄角

translation.en: And he got the hat, walked away.
translation.zh: 他买下帽子 走了

translation.en: When I went home from work,
translation.zh: 当我下班回家的时候

translation.en: I was on the freeway with my little car,
translation.zh: 我在高速公路上开着我的小车

translation.en: and here comes somebody speeding way behind me.
translation.zh: 有人在我后面想要超车

translation.en: Then all of a sudden, he just swerves around my car.
translation.zh: 然后突然 他急转弯 开到我的车旁边

translation.en: It's like he's right there.
translation.zh: 他好像就在我旁边

translation.en: Like a moment, stop.
translation.zh: 有那么一刻 我们像静止了一样

translation.en: And he turns and he just… He's looking at me.
translation.zh: 他转过头 然后他…他就那样看着我

translation.en: I remembered, you know, that was the same guy I saw
translation.zh: 我记得 他就是我在那个旧货店

translation.en: at the thrift store.
translation.zh: 见过的那个人

translation.en: And he has this horrible big grin and he's missing all these teeth.
translation.zh: 他露出可怕的笑容 他没有任何牙齿

translation.en: He just stared at me, like a weird smile.
translation.zh: 他盯着我 笑容越发奇怪

translation.en: It was like a killer clown.
translation.zh: 就像是小丑杀手

translation.en: [Gil] The date was March 17th, 1985, Saint Patrick's Day.
translation.zh: 那天是1985年3月17日 圣帕特里克节

translation.en: [Gil] I actually got that murder with my partner.
translation.zh: 我和我的搭档找到了凶手

translation.en: I get there and the garage door is open.
translation.zh: 我到那里 车库门是开的

translation.en: In the garage,
translation.zh: 在车库里

translation.en: I see blood spatterings around the door and on the floor,
translation.zh: 我看见门上、地板上全是飞溅的血渍

translation.en: right by the door that separates the garage from the condo proper.
translation.zh: 在公寓和车库之间的门旁边

translation.en: There was a baseball cap.
translation.zh: 放着一个棒球帽

translation.en: It said "AC/DC" on it.
translation.zh: 上面有着“AC/DC”字样

translation.en: And I go inside the condo…
translation.zh: 我走进公寓

translation.en: walk around…
translation.zh: 四处走动

translation.en: and see a bloody phone inside the bedroom.
translation.zh: 看见卧室里有一个带血的电话

translation.en: [Gil] And I see Dayle Okazaki lying on the kitchen floor…
translation.zh: 然后我看到黛尔冈崎躺在厨房的地板上

translation.en: wearing a Dodger jersey.
translation.zh: 还穿着道奇队的球衣

translation.en: She had been shot right in the forehead.
translation.zh: 她的额头有一个枪口

translation.en: She'd put her hands on the countertop, and lifted her head up
translation.zh: 她一定是把手放在了桌子上把头撑过桌子上面

translation.en: because it was quiet in there, wanted to see where the suspect was at.
translation.zh: 因为这里很安静她想看看凶手在哪里

translation.en: He was on the other side of the countertop waiting for her,
translation.zh: 凶手在桌子的另一边等着她

translation.en: knowing that she was going to pop her head up, 'cause he could see her hands,
translation.zh: 知道她一定会伸出头因为他能看见她的手

translation.en: waiting there, and when she did, he pulled the trigger.
translation.zh: 他就在那里等着她一探头 他就扣动了扳机

translation.en: Maria Hernandez had just driven home.
translation.zh: 玛利亚赫尔南德斯刚开车到家

translation.en: She entered via the garage door
translation.zh: 她从车库的门进来

translation.en: that she opened with a garage door opener, a remote.
